turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Green Tomato Cars.
turn.1: What company is Green Tomato Cars?
turn.2: Green Tomato Cars Green Tomato Cars is a London-based taxi service that focuses on being environmentally friendly. Customers can order a taxi by phone, through the company’s website, or by using a smartphone app, similar to Uber.
turn.4: They were the first car service in London to operate the Toyota Prius as their flagship car, and the first to use the Toyota Mirai – a hydrogen fuel cell zero emissions vehicle.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: As of 2019, Green Tomato Cars had a fleet of more than 600 Toyota Prius hybrids, and plug-in hybrid and zero emission executive cars.
turn.8: Green Tomato Cars was acquired from Transdev in December 2018.
turn.10: Green Tomato Cars was founded in 2006 by University of Cambridge lawyers Jonny Goldstone and Tom Pakenham.
turn.11: When did they start the company?
turn.12: They started the business in West London with four cars.
